meanings.definition: The state or period of being a child.
meanings.sent1: My childhood was filled with laughter and play.
meanings.sent2: During my childhood, I loved to explore the outdoors.
meanings.sent3: In my childhood, I believed in magical creatures like unicorns.
meanings.sent4: Her childhood was a garden of innocence and wonder.
meanings.sent5: The memories of my childhood are like colorful butterflies fluttering in my mind.

meanings.definition: The early stage in the development or existence of something.
meanings.sent1: The childhood of the project was marked by excitement and anticipation.
meanings.sent2: During the childhood of the company, it faced many challenges.
meanings.sent3: The childhood of the idea seemed full of endless possibilities.
meanings.sent4: In the childhood of the relationship, everything felt new and fresh.
meanings.sent5: The childhood of the plan was like a seed just beginning to sprout.
